--- World Clock Tab ---

Stay connected with the world and track time effortlessly with our new extension! Introducing the World Clock & Local Time Extension, a beautiful and practical addition to your browser that combines functionality with aesthetic appeal.


By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept and agree to installing the extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://worldtimetab.com/terms and privacy policy https://worldtimetab.com/privacy.
